common.generatetokendescription:
Welcome to the Token Management screen! Here, you can create and view token information categorized by service. To create a new token, please:
1. Enter the Secret key in the "Secret key" field.
2. Click the "Generate Token" button to create it.
Below, you will see a list of tokens grouped by service in panels. Expand a panel by clicking on the service name to view details of each token, including its name and value. Click the "Copy" button to copy the desired token value.

utility.titleupdate: Arrange, change the position of the function by drag and drop
utility.maxfunction: Please select up to 12 favorite functions.
utility.setupmenthodauthentitle: Install EMI-Smart OTP on standalone application
utility.setupmenthodauthennote: This feature allows to cancel all EMI - Smart OTP authentication methods that the Customer has registered with EMI (including EMI - Smart OTP standalone application and EMI - Smart OTP integrated on EMI Digibank application)
utility.setupmethodcontent: From 01/01/2024, EMI will deploy a unified Smart OTP version on the EMI Digibank App to authenticate all transactions on the App and on the Web. This version also replaces the previous standalone application EMI Smart OTP. Please download/update the latest version of the EMI Digibank App to authenticate transactions on the Web channel. Please see detailed instructions
utility.setupmethodcontent1: Once you successfully activate the unified Smart OTP on EMI Digibank, the standalone EMI Smart OTP application will also expire.
utility.havenofavoritefunction: You have not selected any favorite functions

saving.beneficiariestitle: Benefits of using EMI's savings products: Attractive interest rate - Diverse terms - Flexible and easy deposit and withdrawal
saving.beneficiariesdescription: Attractive interest rate - Diverse terms - Flexible and easy deposit and withdrawal
saving.onlinefixeddepositdescription: Open online deposit accounts quickly, with a term of up to 24 months
saving.flexibleprincipalwithdrawaldepositdescri: Withdraw money flexibly, continue to enjoy interest for the remaining principal as at the beginning of the term
saving.onlinecumulativefixeddepositdescription: Deposit additional money periodically and flexibly, easily reaching personal financial goals
saving.savingsforchildrendescription: Open cumulative deposit account for your children with a specified target amount and accumulative time
saving.notallowregister: You are not eligible for this loan product. Please contact the hotline for more information.

credit.beneficiariesdescription: Improve life quality with diverse loan products, high loan value, low interest rates, quick disbursement

QR.title: Genenrate QR Code
QR.description:
Generate QR code for Teller Mobile App by following these steps:
 1. Select a transaction from the list. 
 2. Enter the account number (optional). 
 3. Click the 'Genenrate QR Code' button to generate the QR code. 
 4. Download or send the QR code via email if needed.
QR.errorgenqr: An error occurred while generating the QR code. Please try again later.
QR.emailsent: The QR code has been sent to your email successfully.
QR.emailerror: An error occurred while sending the QR code to your email. Please try again later.

contract.title: Contract management
contract.description: A digital banking contract is a legal agreement between a bank and a customer, outlining the terms and conditions for using online banking services.
contract.contractdatesign: This contract is entered into on
contract.personalregistration: INDIVIDUAL / ORGANIZATION OPEN CONTRACT (“Account Holder” or “Customer”)
contract.registerproductdesc: The customer registers to use the following products and services of EMI
contract.contractsuccess: The contract has been successfully created. Please wait for the bank to review and approve your contract. The contract processing time is 1 business day.
contract.contractapprovesuccess: The contract has been successfully approved. You can now use the digital banking services.
contract.contractrejectsuccess: The contract has been successfully rejected. Please check the reason for rejection and reapply.
contract.agentcontractdesc: The agent contract is a legal agreement between the bank and the agent, outlining the terms and conditions for the agent to provide banking services on behalf of the bank.
contract.search_sub: Enter contract number and move focus out to search.
contract.empty_state: Search a contract to see its details here.
contract.cannot_delete_processing: Contract {0} is being processed and cannot be deleted.

sms.title: SMS notification
sms.description: SMS notification is a service that sends text messages to customers' mobile phones to inform them about account transactions, promotions, and other important information.
sms.smsnotificationdescription: Receive SMS notifications for all transactions on your account.

email.title: Email notification
email.description: Email notification is a service that sends emails to customers to inform them about account transactions, promotions, and other important information.
email.subject: Subject

transactioncoreapi.title: Core API transaction
transactioncoreapi.description: Core API transaction is a service that allows customers to perform transactions on their accounts through the bank's core banking system.

kyc.title: KYC Management
kyc.description: KYC (Know Your Customer) management is a process of verifying the identity of customers to prevent fraud and ensure compliance with regulations.

setting.title: Setting
setting.description: Setting is a service that allows customers to configure their account settings, including notification preferences, security settings, and other account-related options.
setting.servicesettingdescription: Configure your account settings, including notification preferences, security settings, and other account-related options.
setting.serviceinstancedescription: Configure your account settings, including notification preferences, security settings, and other account-related options.
setting.openapidescription: OpenAPI is a service that allows external applications to access and perform transactions on the bank's Digital Banking system.
setting.requestlogdescription: Request log is a service that records all API requests sent to the bank's Digital Banking system.
setting.errorlogdescription: Error log is a service that records all errors encountered during API requests sent to the bank's Digital Banking system.
setting.workflowlogdescription: Workflow log is a service that records all workflow processes related to API requests sent to the bank's Digital Banking system.
setting.coresettingdescription: Core setting is a service that allows customers to configure their core banking settings, including account types, transaction limits, and other core banking-related options.
setting.sqlauditlogdescription: SQL Audit Log is a service that records all SQL queries executed on the bank's Core Banking system.
setting.monitoringhealthdescription: Monitoring health is a service that provides insights into the system's performance and availability.

systemcode.title: System Code
systemcode.description: System codes are unique identifiers used to identify objects in the bank's Core Banking system.

openapi.title: OpenAPI Issue
openapi.description: OpenAPI is released to provide a standardized interface for integration, enabling external systems to connect, access, and use services securely and consistently
openapi.access_token_max_uses: Access Token Max Number of Uses

coreinbound.title: Core inbound message
coreinbound.description: Manage inbound messages from core banking system

coreoutbound.title: Core outbound message
coreoutbound.description: Manage outbound messages from core banking system

coresession.title: Core session
coresession.description: Manage core session from core banking system

userdevice.title: User device
userdevice.description: Manage user devices connected to the system

accountchart.title: Account Chart
accountchart.description: Account Chart is a hierarchical structure that organizes accounts into categories and subcategories for better financial management and reporting.
accountchart.doyouwanttodelete: Do you want to delete this Bank account definition with Account level is {0}?
accountchart.delete_success_text: Account chart with Account level {0} has been deleted.

calendar.title: Calendar management
calendar.description: Manage the bank's working days and holidays
